page.title: 04School facilities/activities
page.content: The school is well equipped having a computer,television,video,radio,tape- recorder,record player,piano,sewing machine and photo-copier.There are football and netball pitches,a table- tennis table and a play area.Radio and T.V. programmes form a regular part of the school curriculum.The school year is divided into four terms.Annual school activities include a Burn's supper,Parent's night concert,Nativity Play,Sport's Day,Fund raising evening, Picnic,Hallowe'en and Xmas parties and a charity event:- blankets/money for Ethiopia.The pupils compete in inter shool Quizzes,Football matches and at the Music Festival.There are several educational outings throughout the year.School meals are cooked in a well appointed kitchen and served to more than half the pupils.The school has a cook,kitchen assistant and cleaner.
